experience.title: Application Administrator
experience.subtitle: Foxit Software Inc.
experience.description:
• Responsibilities
    • Reporting to the CIO and working closely on a range of projects.
    • Manage and maintain key business applications like Oracle NetSuite, Freshdesk, KnowBe4, Bitwarden, and M365, ensuring optimal performance, security, and user accessibility.
    • Design, implement, and optimise business system workflows and processes, working in close collaboration with stakeholders for continuous improvement.
    • Manage system enhancement projects, ensuring their timely and cost-effective completion in alignment with business goals.
    • Document system updates and processes, develop user manuals, and improve the Knowledge Base by creating and updating articles.
    • Foster cross-functional collaboration with IT and operations departments, ensuring business systems alignment and resolving issues.
    • Provide technical support to users.
    • Data Cleanup and optimisation
  • Major Achievements
    • Brought control of external software under IT, Asana, Zoom
    • Played a major role in two migration projects, Netsuite and Zendesk to Salesforce Service Cloud
    • Used Miro to document all current processes and possible improvements
    • Created multiple PowerApps:
      • For new employees on day one at the company
      • Organisation chart with the ability to search and view individual users
    • Ran interviews & selection processes for multiple IT/IS roles

experience.title: GBITS-Sec Program Manager
experience.subtitle: Foxit Software Inc.
experience.description:
• Responsibilities
    • Reporting to the CIO
    • Process automation and improvement through the use of Power Automation
      • Global onboarding, offboarding & external data data deletion requests
    • Privacy Inbox (data deletion) request monitoring & actioning
    • Managing the internal IT helpdesk (Freshdesk) and knowledge base including writing articles, creating videos, assigning tickets and generally staying on top of things and improving usage
    • Training in & starting to role out Microsoft Endpoint (Intune) with the goal of being the global endpoint team lead
    • Writing and publishing global policies
  • Major Achievements
    • Utilisied Power Automate & Freshdesk (amongst other tools) to automate multiple processes including both onboarding & offboarding for all new staff
    • Created the companies first proper org chart, utilising Visio and data from Azure AD

experience.title: Digital Marketing Manager (SEM & Data Analytics)
experience.subtitle: Digital Autopilot
experience.description:
• Responsibilities
    • Taking new clients through onboarding and then onto campaign creation
    • Managing clients' Google accounts & implementing new techniques to improve results for client accounts
    • Engaging with clients, running meetings and presenting to clients
    • Creating, designing and analysing client reports, mostly using Google Data Studio, however, we also utilised PowerBI, AgencyAnalytics as well as others
    • Directly managed one staff member & indirectly another to assist them with their daily Google Ads tasks & SEO tasks respectively
  • Major Achievements
    • Increased a repairs business from roughly 30 leads a month to over 200 using a suburb based ads strategy
    • Doubled a beauty & wellness spas' leads & Revenue - watch here

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description:
• Business Applications: NetSuite, Salesforce, Freshdesk, KnowBe4, Bitwarden
  • Microsoft 365: Power Automate, PowerApps, SharePoint, Teams, Intune
  • Data Analysis: Google Data Studio, PowerBI, AgencyAnalytics
  • Marketing: Google Ads, SEO, SEM
  • Programming: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL
